name: Covid Karens: The Father's Fight
description:
Made in three days for a challenge for my Twitch. (the challenge was to make a game in six days based off of a 10 minute brainstorming session with my friend, i ended up doing it in three)

Controls, WASD to move, leftclick/space to attack/deflect, right/shift to jump/dash

In this game, you have to work at a grocery store, fight of karens and do all that fun stuff, post your highscores in the comments!

NOTE: the web version doesn't have dialogue due to it absolutely being destroyed because of errors and stuff, you can still play, but if you want dialogue you have to install the windows version.

I asked AI for the title cause I was bored, and couldn't think of anything. here is my prompt and it's response.

My Prompt: "what should i name my game about a dad during covid who has to fight off karens?" -- It's responce: "Covid Karens: The Father's Fight is the title of this unique game. In this game you take on the role of a Dad during the Covid-19 pandemic who must defend his family from the daily onslaught of Karens. The Karens come in all shapes and sizes, from the grocery store to the local park, but they have one goal: to make your life difficult. You must use your wits and your arsenal of household items to fend off these annoying interlopers. Along the way you'll have to battle other Karens, upgrade your weapons, and even take on bigger bosses. With each successful battle, you'll gain experience and be able to upgrade your character and level up your skills. With fun, fast-paced gameplay and unique challenges, Covid Karens: The Father's Fight is sure to keep you entertained and engaged for hours."

Not perfect, but summarizes the game pretty well.
